name: Homefence
description:
A game developed in 2 days for JAMDNA game jam !!!

A game developed by Shashank.S.

All the models were designed by me during the jam , scripts were written by me , totally a game developed by me.

Only font and tune were downloaded from the internet.

Game description - 

Defend your home from enemies by planting turrets !!!

Help - 

-Zoom by using mouse scroll wheel

-Left click to plant a turret

-Hold right click and move the mouse to move the camera in same plane

-Hold middle mouse button and rotate the mouse to rotate the camera

Just like using the mouse in the unity editor

Hope you like this game !!!

A feedback would be great !!!
